oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bell Avenue streetcar
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: unknown
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Bell Avenue streetcar. #20. Knoxville Traction Company. Notice: "Boarding and leaving car while in motion forbidden. Employees cannot waive this rule." "Come to Chilhowee Park Skating Rink." Two conductors and one man in long coat near streetcar.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Street railroads; Street railroad employees; Conductors;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: To use photographs or to order reproductions, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8808. Please refer to Image Number if available and provide a brief description of the photograph.
